document_data.name: Jared
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jared''' was a merchant from the [[Sword Coast]], active ''circa'' [[1368 DR]].

{{quote|''Why, thank you. That old lumbering oaf could have had me there if it weren't for young lumbering oafs like yourselves.''|Jared the Marchant}}
document_data.Personality: Jared had an uppity and abrasive personality.
document_data.Possessions: The merchant owned a pair of ''[[boots of the north]]''.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Jared somehow ended up on a river crossing the west from the town of [[Nashkel]], pursued by a hungry [[polar bear]]. The merchant was desperate to find aid against the beast and offered [[gold]] and his pair of ''boots of the north'' as the reward.
